scripts.update: pnpm -r update -i -L && pnpm -r run update && pnpm install && pnpm run build --force
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:modules && pnpm run clean:lock && pnpm run clean:turbo && pnpm install && pnpm run build --force
scripts.clean:builds: find ./ -name .next -type d -exec rm -rf {} + && find ./ -name dist -type d -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.clean:lock: find ./ -name packages-lock.json -type f -exec rm -rf {} + && find ./ -name yarn.lock -type f -exec rm -rf {} + && find ./ -name pnpm-lock.yaml -type f -exec rm -rf {} +
